column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////The not so positive - The dough was very undercooked
column2: so  each time I took a bite I was welcomed with gooey cold pizza dough.  Also
column3: it seemed like my waiter disappeared after he took my order and he forgot my order of bread for the salad.  Overall
column5: but I think there are much better pizza places in Chi-Town.
